alert.note: Alert for Tehama (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 4:57PM PDT until August 18 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Tehama County in northern California... * Until 545 PM PDT. * At 456 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Saddle Camp, or 15 miles south of Yolla Bolly District Rs, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Tehama County west of Saddle Camp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
